quizz.created: Un nuevo Quizz ha sido creado con el identificador {{ param }}
quizz.updated: Un Quizz ha sido actualizado con el identificador {{ param }}
quizz.deleted: Un Quizz ha sido eliminado con el identificador {{ param }}

delete.question: ¿Seguro que quiere eliminar Quizz {{ id }}?
delete.warning: Toda la información asociada a este cuestionario se eliminará permanentemente. Esta operación no se puede deshacer.

quizz.title: Título

rules.title: Some rules of this Quiz
rules.timedRule: You have {{ time }} seconds to answer each question
rules.unlimitedRule: You have unlimited time to complete the quizz
rules.backRule: You can go back to previous questions
rules.reviewRule: You can review your answers before submitting
rules.attemptRule: You have {{ attempsLimit }} attempts per {{attempsLimitPeriod}} to complete for this Quiz
rules.cantExitRule: You can't exit the quizz once started

publish.title: Confirm Publish
publish.question: Are you sure you want to publish Quizz {{ title }}?
publish.warning: This operation will make the Quizz available for public access. You can't undo this operation.
